images.copyright: Common octopus off the coast of France in the Mediterranean Sea (© BIOSPHOTO/Alamy)
images.title: An uncommonly cool critter
images.caption: An uncommonly cool critter
images.desc: An octopus's life depends on camouflage, so don't tell this one it's sticking out like a sore tentacle. Or maybe this master of disguise is posing for the camera on purpose. Either way, we're glad to have spotted it just in time for World Octopus Day!

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
